title: Yours

description.plain:
Malone first teased the song on June 16th through his social media platforms, which was Father’s Day in the United States. The first live performance of this song prior to its official release was during “A Night in Nashville” at Music Marathon Works in Tennessee on July 16th, 2024.

Malone is a father to one baby girl, who inspired the writing of this song. In his introduction, Malone acknowledged he may be getting ahead of himself: “I wrote this song about my daughter getting married,” he said. “I got a two-year-old, and we got a long time to go.”

This song embodies what the emotions for that day are going to be.

embed_content: Read “Yours” by Post Malone on Genius

album.full_title: F-1 Trillion (Long Bed) by Post Malone

I don't know who you are
But one day, I'm goin' to
And it's gonna break my heart
When she gives hers to you
And it won't be tomorrow

When I walk her down that aisle and do what daddies have to do

We'll both love her forever
But I loved her long before
And one day, I know I'll give her away
Buddy, that don't mean she's yours
